body: well i got banned for something i learned is bannable and i feel sad cuz i never knew and my favourite server is no longer playable and i don't know when I'm able to appeal so goodbye to everyone for a couple of months or more even it was good to play on it i loved the folks and everybody btw never try advertising it is bannable i learned that today

title: Goodbye?

replies.body: Appeal, maybe Sr Mods would let you go.
replies.body_tagged: Appeal, maybe Sr Mods would let you go.

replies.body: I would talk to Midnight, she's cooperative if you made a mistake. If you can't find her, go talk to a mod or senior mod to help you. Since you didn't know about these mistakes, you might get a warning instead. Good luck!
replies.body_tagged: I would talk to Midnight, she's cooperative if you made a mistake. If you can't find her, go talk to a mod or senior mod to help you. Since you didn't know about these mistakes, you might get a warning instead. Good luck!

replies.body: Bye and good luck in life! :(

replies.body:
You get easily unbanned from an Advertisement ban since you have no other infractions.

Just appeal it
